name: Unlike
description:
Unlike is in a way, a puzzle platformer. While making your way through each level you must make sure that you are not the same color as any of the platforms you touch.  Controls are: 

  1. Jump: space/v
  2. Left/Right: Arrow keys
  3. Color Cycle: z

Your character cycles colors in the order: Blue, Yellow, Red.

This was made in 48 hours for Paint Jam 2020.

(If spacebar makes the page scroll down, open the game in full screen or use v instead of space)
